name: Cyberpunk 2020 Character Generator
short_description:
This is an application designed to help in creating player characters for R. Talsorian Games Inc's Cyberpunk 2020 roleplaying system (2nd Ed.). It automates the process somewhat so that it requires no calculation and walks the player through a step-by-step process.

There are a few houserules or interpretations/clarifications of rules included in this generator:
1. The IP cost does not affect the initial character generation skill points cost;
2. The languages are separated from skills now somewhat, in that they don't gain a bonus from their main stat (INT), since it is either useless anyway or means that a character with high INT automatically knows all the languages. Instead, INT score improves your starting language score (9 for INT > 5, 10 for INT > 8), and, therefore, the scores for the languages in your language group.

These houserules will be made optional in the future.
summary: A generator of player characters for Cyberpunk 2020 (2nd Ed.)
